name: Lost in the Labyrinth
overview: Experience the frustrations and torments of an explorer who is lost in a labyrinth of tunnels. Use your skill to find your way out of danger. Only your Stack lightpen can lead you to safety from the labyrinth which holds untold terrors. The bear lurks unseen. If you approach within 3 squares the alert sounds, within 1 square and you will have to fight the bear by touching the top line. Winning gains you 50 food points, but defeat costs you 50 points. Once fought, the bear disappears. The cheat allows a quick look at the entire maze but costs you 50 food points. When you complete a maze or run out of food, advice is offered. Touching contact will draw a new maze. This game requires a light pen to be plugged into the 'analogue in' port.
